DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion MDS IPSS low int-1 hemoglobin < 10/dL . Study drug : Darbepoetin alfa ( Aranesp ) 500 microg every two week subcutaneously 12 week , combine filgrastim 300 microg twice weekly additional 12 week non responder . Response evaluate 12 week . Patients major minor erythroid response ( HI-E major minor accord IWG 2000 criterion ) continue Aranesp . In non-responders , additional 12 week Aranesp dosing , combine Filgrastim ( 300 ug twice weekly , adjust maintain WBC 5000 10000/mm3 ) propose . In case response , treatment continue total duration 24 month . If Hb level reach level > 13 g/dl time , Aranesp discontinue Hb level less 12 g/dl . Aranesp resume 500 µg/injection every 3 week . Intervals injection increase one week every time lead Hb level > 13 g/dl . The purpose dose adjustment reach Aranesp schedule allow maintenance Hb level 11 12 g/dl .
